citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:08am on
18-JUL-19.
I spoke with the facility representative who informed me that the animal keeper and the owner were not available.
